name: The Snatcher
description:
Created by Josh Castillo and Emily Chavez

Natalie wakes up stranded in an endless dark forest. A faded memory of her snatcher fills her head. Join Natalie in this bizarre adventure and help her by going through obstacles, fighting weird looking monsters, and escaping from cute animals....??? in order to be able to find her snatcher!

CONTROLS

Move: WASD keys

Jump: space bar or W key

Shoot: left click  mouse

Aim: move mouse to change directions

Pause and Options: ESCAPE key 

Main menu: M key

Continue dialogue: F key or left click with mouse on “continue” button

Switch Levers: E key 

Side Note:

You only have 3 lives for the whole game and when you save, it will resume at the start of the level you saved on along with how many lives you had left.
